about_the_game:
The Guardians Realm is an open-world Fantasy RPG in a medieval setting. It's inspired by other great RPGs like Runescape and Classic WoW, and focuses on combat, crafting, gathering, and exploring.

OPEN WORLD

In The Guardians Realm, your survival hinges on your skills in combat, crafting, gathering, and exploration. Engage in dynamic, skill-based combat with a free-moving camera that gives you full battlefield control and the ability to engage with multiple enemies. Craft powerful weapons and armor, gather resources, and defeat legendary bosses for greater rewards.

The game's flexible skill progression system allows you to tailor your character to suit your preferred play-style, whether you're a fearless warrior, a master craftsman, or a dedicated resource gatherer. With every choice you make, The Guardians Realm evolves, offering endless possibilities and unforgettable experiences.

SKILL-BASED COMBAT

Engage in fast-paced, skill-based combat with a free-moving camera that gives you full control over the battlefield. Utilize a variety of weapons, armor, and abilities to create your perfect custom build. Execute powerful combos with melee and range combat to defeat multiple foes and take down powerful bosses. Use your abilities to escape death, deal killing blows, or give yourself an advantage in critical moments.

CRAFTING

Master the art of crafting to create powerful weapons, sturdy armor, and essential survival tools. Gather resources from the environment, refine them, and combine them in ways to suit your play-style. Level up your gathering and crafting skills to create more powerful equipment.

GATHERING

  • Berries

  • Fruits

SKILLS

  • Woodcutting

  • Firemaking

  • Cooking

  • Fishing

  • Crafting
